attributes.action: Ban horses from being used on certain roads.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want to create a petition for horses to be band on certain roads because they are a danger to road users, as well as the riders themselves. I believe it is ridiculous how animals that bolt at cars, are allowed on roads where cars travel at 60mph. I know how riders need somewhere to ride, but the road side, is not the place to do it any more. I always slow down for horses, but I'm sure that many of us have had a time where it's been perhaps dangerous, or to late too brake by the time you see them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
